response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your specific needs. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, we believe it would be an invaluable asset to you. Considering its market value and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to purchase the product for $9,500. This price reflects a strategic balance between maximizing the return on our investment and ensuring you receive a fair deal. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you better. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 9500}
